page.title: 04Arts and Crafts.
page.content: The Old Arts School Workshop is run by Mr. & Mrs. P. Hibbard in the premises previously used as the Primary School. The Hibbards came to Middleham in 1981. Peter Hibbard is a sculptor who enjoys working with alabaster. He also draws, paints and makes furniture. The building is run as an art gallery, bookshop and snack-bar and people come for art courses and holidays. Approx 228 people visit the gallery each week. An exhibition of batik pictures painted by the head- master of the Primary School was held in June. Mr.Hibbard was in charge of the Middleham Festival in 1983 ; is vice chairman of the Cricket Club and a church sidesman. He would like to see the Old Town Hall made into a Community Centre.
